creditline: The Dr. Frances E. Schaar Fund in memory of Leon and Anna Schaar
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: assembly of rifle butts, machine gun magazines, shell casings, a hammer, and other weaponry and utilitarian objects crating abstracted face; two shell casings within metal O-rings create eyes; offset cylinder mouth
markings: serial number stamped into rifle butts: lower: 27995 | back of upper: 25383
title: Untitled (mask)
